H0.text: British actor Maurice Micklewhite is better known by what name. Michael White

H1.text: British actor Maurice Micklewhite is better known by what name. Maurice Manning

H2.text: British actor Maurice Micklewhite is better known by what name. Michael Mann

H3.text: British actor Maurice Micklewhite is better known by what name. Cained

A4.text: Caine changed his name by deed poll to his long-time stage name, Michael Caine.

A5.text: He was born Maurice Joseph Micklewhite and is known as Michael Caine.
